MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 15-JAN-2021 21:25.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the DD6 postcode area of Tayport. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have been working on site to repair an underground cable fault on Tay Street. We are currently finalizing the repair and we now expect your supply to be restored by 9.30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:52PM on Friday 15 January 2021.
